body.name: ULANZI Phone Tripod Mount ST-06S, New Universal Smartphone Mount Adapter with 2 Cold Shoe, 360° Rotates Adjustable Cell Phone Clip Clamp Holder, Compatible with iPhone, Samsung Galaxy and All Phones
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 7 hrs 27 mins
features: 2 Standard Cold Shoe and 1/4" Screw Design: The mobile phone tripod mount upgraded, has a standard 1/4" screw holes and two cold shoe mounts. 1/4" screw holes can be installed on tripods, selfie sticks, stabilizers and other accessories; 2 cold shoe mounts can fix microphones, photography lights and other equipment

Any Angle, Instead of a Ball Head: The traditional smartphone tripod mount cannot adjust the Z-axis angle, but our phone tripod adapter ST-06s adjustable angle design allows you to adjust the pitch angle on a tripod or camera hot shoe without a ball head. It is more convenient and easy to use

Update and Safer Design: Ulanzi phone mount upgrade traditional installation method, push and lock by simply press the button, easier to use. Thick non-slip silicone pad and enhance the fixed gear, it won’t hurt the phone while holding it firmly, the cell phone clip is more stable

360° Rotating Tripod Phone Holder: You can rotate your phone from portrait mode (vertical) to landscape mode (horizontal). Ulanzi cell phone holder for tripod design makes it easier for you to find the best shooting angle and capture every moment of your life by taking photos and photography

Mini Size and Wide Compatibility: Weighing only 51g, The phone clamp is compatible with iPhone 12 11 Pro Max X XR Xs Max 8 7 Plus SE, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 Note 10 9 Google Huawei and so on (any smartphone within 2.36 inch to 3.54 inch wide). You will like it to meet your needs without removing the phone case
body.description: ULANZI Phone Tripod Mount ST-06S, Universal Smartphone Mount Adapter with 2 Cold Shoe Multi-scene Use Camera Travel Tripod Bring it outside, take a beautiful view Make you happier Mini Tripod With 1/4 screw, no matter what kind of tripod you have, it can all work. Make things easier Ring Light Wireless remote, free your hands You can get more scenes in your life

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About us: Founded in 2016 by a team of the photographer lovers, our original vision is not only to collect high quality and stylish products from the world, but also to develop own products with fabulous and yet practical design. We specialize in the development of mobile phone photography and other photographic equipment accessories, mainly based on mobile video accessories such as mobile phone stabilizer, rigs, microphone, LED lights, fixed bracket, lens, tripod,action camera accessories,etc. ULANZI Phone Tripod Mount ST-06S, Universal Smartphone Mount Adapter with 2 Cold Shoe Multi-scene Use Camera Travel Tripod Bring it outside, take a beautiful view Make you happier Mini Tripod With 1/4 screw, no matter what kind of tripod you have, it can all work. Make things easier Ring Light Wireless remote, free your hands You can get more scenes in your life

360° Rotation Angle You can adjust the horizontal or vertical screen shooting according to your preference to satisfy your VLOG video shooting 1/4" Standard Screw Hole The universal design is suitable for most tripods, monopods, selfie sticks, ring lights, etc. It is a perfect match for the photography industry Flexible Adjustment of Z-axis You can freely adjust the pitch angle and capture different angles. Preferred choice for Ulanzi phone monitor mount

2 Cold Shoe Mount ST-06s has its own cold shoe mount design, which allows fixing microphones, photographic lights and other equipment One Key Press Lock Mode Original creation, upgrade traditional installation method, more stable, safer and easier to use Non-slip Silicone Pad The use of high-quality materials, widening, thickening, and enlarged gear design make your phone more stable and safer

Ulanzi Tips - QA (Frequently Asked Questions): Q1: Can this be mounted on a hot shoe on a camera? It says cold shoe. Yes, it can be used as a hot shoe, sliding directly into the camera hot shoe without causing any interference. Q2: Can it fit on a ring light tripod? Yes, there is a 1/4'' screw on the bottom of the tripod mount. Q3: What is in the box? 1*ST-06S phone holder 1*Packing box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great perfect at any angle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Snug fit, works on iPhone pro max
reviews.reviewText: Very happy as it is stable and very adjustable. Excellent product T for use with my very big iPhone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A good lightweight choice
reviews.reviewText: What do I like about this tripod/monopod phone holder? I like its versatility. Its ability to be used in landscape or portrait mode. Its ability to be filly tilted back or forwards 90°.With all that maneuverability its use is almost endless for cell phone vidoeography and vlogging.It can also be used for directly downward shots and video.One observation and his isn't a dislike, is that with its lightweight plastic construction you will notice vibrations since it doesnt have the sturdiness of a metal cell phone holder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Recently broke my previous phone holder, this one came in clutch!
reviews.reviewText: I had broke the last phone holder I had and I didn't feel like buying an entirely new ring light and this came in handy. It slid right into place on my ring light, it's sturdy, and I can rotate it. Perfect for whatever I need to use it for, dare I say better than the phone holder that I broke.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It honestly doesn’t feel sturdy enough. I know for the price it’s like what you expect but also I think for its price u can find really good phone mounts for ur car so I don’t c why not translate it here as well. Though I am being picky since I feel like it’s gonna hold my expensive ass phone so it got to be. Also the way it hold the phone is weird. It’s not like spring it just u push it down and the lock it. So it’s a bit scuffed I think. But at the end of the day it works so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits the Max sized IPhones in Otterbox Defender cases
reviews.reviewText: I tried a couple of different holders for my iPhone to shoot video, as well as watch at eye level with my coffee in the morning. Max sized iPhones in big cases like the Otterbox rarely fit, but this works great. Was going to spring for a more expensive all metal version until I found this. Will be buying more Ulanzi gear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It was easy, works for my use. Sturdiness we will find out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars made of cheap plastic unexpected from Ulansi
reviews.reviewText: The cellphone holder is made of cheap plastic. It would bend or flex whenever you try to adjust it thus leading to possible breaking it. you get what you paid for and not worth it. Returned immediately to be replaced by a metal constructed one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Peça muito útil para quem tem celular e tira fotografia
reviews.reviewText: Eu tenho um celular quebrado da Sansung, e como a camera ainda está funcionando, estou aproveitando o mesmo só como câmera digital de 13Mp e WebCam de alta resolução. E este suporte será muito útil para adaptar o celular num tripé pequeno.

I got this to connect my phone to my tripod and it works very well. It holds my phone just fine (Pixel 7 in very clunky case and Galaxy S22+ also in clunky case) and feels very sturdy and good quality.I have not really tested the adjustable elements of this mount because my tripod can do that all.No complaints from me, it does the job well and can hold my fairly big phone.
The product doesn't look like the picture, it's actually not white, it's beige.
